data.name: harmonize-wq
data.description: Standardize, clean, and wrangle Water Quality Portal data into more analytic-ready formats

evidence: README install command: "python3 -m pip install harmonize-wq"
"US EPA’s Water Quality Portal (WQP) aggregates water quality, biological, and physical data..." and the repo owner is USEPA, indicating a U.S. government institution maintains the project.

"the harmonize_wq package is intended to be a flexible water quality specific framework to help: - Identify differences in data units ... - Transform data from long to wide format" – a domain-specific tool users run for data cleaning/wrangling, i.e., an application.
